sentences.sContent: Do you want me to eat dirt from a flowerpot?
sentences.sContent_eng: Do you want me to eat dirt from a flowerpot?
sentences.sCn: 你想让我把花盆里的土都吃了还是咋地？

sentences.sContent: He might as well plant an oak in a flowerpot, and expect it to thrive, as imagine he can restore her to vigour in the soil of his shallow cares!
sentences.sContent_eng: He might as well plant an oak in a flowerpot, and expect it to thrive, as imagine he can restore her to vigour in the soil of his shallow cares!
sentences.sCn: 他与其想象他能在他那浮浅的照料中使她恢复精力，还不如说正像把一棵橡树种在一个花盆里！

trans.tranOther: a plastic or clay pot in which you grow plants
